catchphrases.catchphrase: claims made under the safety, rehabilitation and compensation act 1988
application for access to documents under the freedom of information act 1982
claims of exemption on the ground of legal professional privilege

sentences.sentence: This is an application the Applicant were not exempt on the contended ground of legal professional privilege, from access to the Respondent pursuant to Part 3 of the Freedom of Information Act 1982.
